item.title: Infrastructure Federal Program in Argentina (PFIR)
item.description:
This program consist in a new credit line of $720 million by three multilateral financing agencies: Interamerican Developent Bank (IDB), Development Bank of Latin America and the Caribbean (CAF), and Rio de la Plata Basin Financial Development Fund (FONPLATA).

Projects where I participated:

  • New Chilecito Hospital (La Rioja, Argentina)
    Bid amount: $23 million
    Building size: 5 acres (20,000 sq m)

  • Former Caseros Penintenciary Center/New offices Buenos Aires City Goverment (Historic Restoration Project)
    Building size: 10 acres (40,000 sq m) - 7 upper and 2 underground levels.
    Project Cost: $72 million
